upgrades.changelog:
* Separated ramp rate into 4 new settings: on physical (parameter 9), on Z-Wave (parameter 28), off physical (parameter 27), and off Z-Wave (parameter 29)
* Improved night light mode (it takes 1 second instead of 2 to turn the night on via night light mode)
* Added a new setting to indicate remote dimming duration when using the ZEN74 in association with other dimmers (parameter 30)
